title: request_files Lambda Input
description: The input for the request_files Lambda.

cumulus_meta.description: Defined by the Cumulus Dashboard and CMA.

asyncOperationId.description: The unique identifier used for tracking requests. If not present, will be generated.

granules.description: A list of objects representing individual files to restore.

granuleId.description: The id of the granule being restored.

keys.description: Keys related to where the files will be located.

key.description: Name of the file within the granule.  # TODO: It actually might be a path.

dest_bucket.description: The bucket the restored file will be moved to after the restore completes.
